children.text: One reliable option (whether you’re a business, artist or film producer) is doing what’s worked before. To squeeze the value out of something so much that it’s almost cliche. To do more of what’s worked in the past, only slightly different. This is the temptation of sequels and remakes and of rehashing the same old thing.

The other gets you Okja and Roma and Tallulah.
